editClassifiedsCtrl

  1. - type in module ngClassifieds

Classifieds controller for editing already existing classifieds.

Methods

  • closeSidebar();

    sets vm.sidenavOpen to equal false.

  • saveEdit(editedClassified);

    emits the classified to the parent controller to be saved.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    editedClassified Object

    The edited classified

Properties

  • sidenavOpen$watch

    Watches for vm.sidenavOpen to be closed, then navigates to /classifieds
